sourcesContent: import{useMemo as y}from"react";var a=(c,n,t)=>{let i=y(()=>{let e=[];return Array.isArray(n)&&(e=[...e,...n]),Array.isArray(t)&&(e=[...e,...t]),e},[n,t]);return y(()=>async(...e)=>{try{return await c(...e)}catch(o){typeof n=="function"?n(o):console.error("useMemo",o)}},i)};export{a};
